alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 20 at 3:10PM AKDT until May 21 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 10 PM AKDT SATURDAY FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE COPPER RIVER BASIN... The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a Red Flag Warning for hot, dry, and windy conditions, which is in effect from noon to 10 PM AKDT Saturday. * WINDS...Southeast winds up to 15 mph with gusts up to 20 mph. * TIMING...Noon to 10 PM Saturday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...65 to 70 degrees. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest sustained winds, gusts, and lowest relative humidity values are expected along the Richardson and Edgerton Highways, including along the Copper River.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
